name: Invert Y
description:
Invert Y

Made by:

-Ambres "Tienes" LECOULES /  tienes35@gmail.com

-Mathéo "Nothrepote"  HINGRAY /   matheo071999@hotmail.fr

Contact us!

This game take place in a medieval room where you'll have to escape as quick as possible! There's anothher dimension in this room! The "Y dimension"! Some of the objects thhat were in the room are now in the other dimension! Go in and out this dimension to recover them and escape as fast as you can!

Don't forget to tell us your score and to give us some feedbacks!
